articles.title: Shelling in eastern Ukraine region of Donbas escalates as US says Russian buildup of troops increases to biggest numbers since WWII - ABC News
articles.description: As shelling in eastern Ukraine escalates once more the US Ambassador to Europe says Russia now has amassed a build-up of troops at the border, the size of which has not been seen since WWII.
articles.content: Russia's build-up of military personnel threatening Ukraine probably totals up to 190,000, the US ambassador to the Organization for Security and Cooperation (OSCE) in Europe said in a statement to a… [+5688 chars]

articles.title: EU, Africa aim to resolve vaccine patent dispute by spring -EU chief - Reuters
articles.description: Europe and Africa will work together to resolve by spring a rich-versus-poor nation dispute over how to ensure fair distribution of COVID-19 vaccines and treatments, the head of the European Commission said on Friday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Feb 18 (Reuters) - Europe and Africa will work together to resolve by spring a rich-versus-poor nation dispute over how to ensure fair distribution of COVID-19 vaccines and treatments, the … [+1992 chars]
